title: The Door without a key. The Landlady
creator_contributor_role: Alfred J Hitchcock Productions, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Amnesia
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Amnesia
description: Episode number 4 of Series "Alfred Hitchcock presents". Two more fine tales introduced by the master of the macabre. "The Door without a key": Uplifting tale of the comings and goings of a police-station late at night. Stars Claude Rains as a man with amnesia and Billy Mumy as a lost little boy. "The Landlady": A young man arrives in a provincial town in England needing a place to stay. It was strange circumstance that drew the young man to stay at this boarding house, it was an even stranger circumstance that made him a permanent guest. A gentle horror story based on a Roald Dahl short story and adapted by Robert Bloch. Stars Dean Stockwell.
